atk-vin02a13:1_0: 655. Adhikaraṇasamathesu – sattāti tesaṁ dhammānaṁ saṅkhyāparicchedo. Catubbidhaṁ
atk-vin02a13:1_1: adhikaraṇaṁ samenti vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Tesaṁ vitthāro khandhake ca
atk-vin02a13:1_2: parivāre ca vutto, tassatthaṁ tattheva vaṇṇayissāma. Sesaṁ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-vin02a13:6: Ciraṁ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṁ ciraṁ pajaṁ;
atk-vin02a13:7: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu medaninti.
